history.proof: intros u v w H1 H2. qsimpl use: orthogonal_colineaire. apply colineaire_sym. hauto use: transitive, permute, colineaire_modulo_pi, colineaire_sym unfold: colineaire, double.

ctx: intros u v w H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment u, v, w : V H1 : colineaire u v H2 : colineaire v w Unable to unify "R (double (cons ?M1468 ?M1470)) pi" with "R (double (cons u w)) zero".

original: intros u v w H1 H2. apply orthogonal_colineaire with (v:=v). - apply colineaire_sym. auto. - auto.
